1122.title: Brandy Silver

11221.content:
The Glamazons were the fattest most popular girls at ENIGMA high school, they were they needed to keep their weight up to keep their popularity up, they were the the most beautiful women in the school and they knew it, their leader was Kimmie McAdams; she was the LARGEST of the three, the other two were still catching up to her size and weight.

There was one student who adored the Glamazons, her name was Brandy Silver. Brandy was a popular girl, not as popular as the Glamazons but popular enough to be in the presence, she was a bottom heavy girl; the Glamazons saw that brandy had potential to be part of their clique.

It was a normal day at Enigma high Brandy was sitting in class, her current subject was home economics as she loved baked goods and also helping with the making of said baked goods. The bell rings for lunch as everyone went to the cafeteria for today's lunch, Brandy was I line waiting for her turn to get the food she paid for, suddenly she feels the floor quake Brandy knew what was causing the earthquakes 'Their coming; their coming to ask me to join their clique the Glamazons.' Brandy thought as the Glamazons were waddling her way.

Brandy couldn't believe that the Glamazons were grazing her this early in the start of the school year, "Brandy Silver, we the "Glamazons" have been watching you, you have the potential to be a future Glamazon, though we're so "popular" (actually FAT) we were once like you" Kimmie McAdams tells the bottom heavy girl infront of her, "but before we enlist you, you must pass our initiation, it's going to be the hardest thing you've ever experienced in your life!" Kimmie told Brandy "Brandy Silver are you ready to become a Glamazon" the three BEAUTIFUL women asked Brandy
11221.title: The HAMAzons
